Soukou Kihei VOTOMS: Red Shoulder Document - Yabou no Roots (Japanese)
装甲騎兵ボトムズ レッドショルダードキュメント野望のルーツ (Japanese)
plot: Chirico Cuvie has been assigned to a new unit, the Red Shoulder division. His selection is not an accident, as he has an ability that possibly makes him the ultimate soldier. The Red Shoulder unit is callous and merciless in their training, and will test Chirico's ability to the limit.
